message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet at $11,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $11,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
